acf.banner_content_mobile: Experienced Idaho Civil Engineers for your Residential Project Needs
acf.copyright_text: © 2023 ProStruct Engineering Inc. All Rights Reserved.
acf.e_california_civil_engineers_civil_engin:
Civil Engineering Services

Comprehensive site development solutions tailored for residential, commercial, and mixed-use projects. Our civil engineering team ensures every design is code-compliant, cost-efficient, and construction-ready.

Stormwater Drainage Design

Prevent on-site flooding and ensure local compliance with professionally designed stormwater systems. We analyze runoff patterns and develop drainage plans that protect your property and infrastructure.

Grading Plans

Establish the right foundation for your project. Our grading plans help manage slope, support proper drainage, and align with building requirements — minimizing costly changes during construction.

Erosion & Sediment Control

Maintain environmental compliance and site integrity. We create effective erosion control plans that reduce runoff, protect surrounding land, and meet city or county permitting standards.

Cut & Fill Calculations

Balance earthwork to save on hauling and material costs. We provide precise cut and fill analysis to help optimize your site prep and streamline your construction process. GET YOUR FREE QUOTE
acf.footer_bottom_content: (1)This only applies to our scope of work and omits unsuccessful permitting due to external factors like land ownership disputes, existing illegal Construction, flawed Architectural/Design plans, issues with client-provided documents, or the client halting the project for any reason, etc.
acf.footer_site_description: Our civil engineers offer dependable professional civil engineering services for residential building permits at reasonable prices. Trust us to deliver high-quality civil plans.

acf.section_content_about_us: ProStruct Engineering’s experienced team of Professional Structural & Civil Engineers provides high-quality engineering plans that comply with building permit requirements for residential & commercial projects. Our goal is to offer budget-friendly services and act as a dependable ally throughout your project. Our services include Structural Site Inspections, Structural Calculations, creating Structural Plans, and preparing Structural Permit Sets.
acf.section_content_about_us_mobile: Our services include Civil Site Inspections, Civil Calculations, creating Civil Plans, and preparing Civil Permit Sets. Our goal is to enhance the home-building journey of Washington homeowners by offering budget- friendly services and acting as a dependable ally throughout the process.
acf.section_content_pt:
Project Types

  Our Structural & Civil Engineers’ expertise extends to a variety of Residential and Commercial Project Types, including:
  • New Custom Home
  • ADU
  • Home Addition/Remodel
  • Load Bearing Wall Removal
  • Commercial Projects
  • Retaining Wall
  • Deck, Patio & Porch
  • Foundation Design & More
  • Construction Administration
